metadata.name: ProQuad 1000 CCID Injection solution
metadata.composition: 1000 CCID Varicella Zoster Vaccine Live attenuated

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Zostavax vaccine is indicated for the prevention of herpes zoster shingles in immunocompetent adults aged 50 years and older Varivax vaccine is indicated for active immunization for the prevention of varicella in individuals 12 months of age and older
